They buy REAL unpretentious vehicles like this here Dodge Ram.  Aren't you a REAL person?  Don't you want to show how REAL you are by driving this truck?"

"But this is why we are drifting. And we are drifting there because nations are caught up with the drum major instinct. "I must be first." "I must be supreme." "Our nation must rule the world." (Preach it) And I am sad to say that the nation in which we live is the supreme culprit. And I'm going to continue to say it to America, because I love this country too much to see the drift that it has taken." -Martin Luther King Jr.
